title: NOOO Riven is disabled :C
body:
jk

ITS TIME TO CELEBRATE AND SPAM RANKED !!

replies.body: Who's gonna have a bug next, Kalista? YES PLEASE! :D :D

Actual footage of Platinum/Silver players

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WW1h4iKeMZ0
Can confirm, Palpatine is a silver player.
As a Diamond player myself I can verify the code actually doesn't differ too much from the silver one LOL.

http://prntscr.com/7t8y3k

You had 1 job Rek'sai. ONE F\*\*\*\*\*\* JOB
OMG beautiful {{item:3070}};_;{{item:3070}}
I would rather then sever her head then disable her, but that's just my preference.
Can we display the head on a pole in front of the rito building, to serve as a constant reminder to not make overloaded champions?
With Zed and Riven banned, it feels like LoL became a better game for it.
Now to see if they'll add devourer to the list of things banned.
It's about time for a {{champion:67}} bug I think.
I think Kalista takes priority :P

> [{quoted}](name=Saianna,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-07-16T00:48:50.851+0000)
>
> I think Kalista takes priority :P

I dislike Vayne more for the attitude her players tend to have, although I do find her to be an annoying champion in general. Kalista's don't seem to have the same horrible attitude in my experience. Not anymore than adc's normally have, anyways.

ah, I see.

I've supported only 1 vayne in my whole life.
Vayne DC'd 10 minutes after game started.
No rage quits i believe.. Just no luck..

So i might not know how most of Vayne players behave :)

>ITS TIME TO CELEBRATE AND SPAM RANKED !!

And now ranked is disabled.
So much for that plan.
Have fun getting facerolled by sated devourer junglers then ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoki Shinkuro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:26:11.822+0000)
>
> Have fun getting facerolled by sated devourer junglers then ^^

That gets disabled next XD
OH god that would be awesome. Then I can finaly play ranked again Q_Q.
I mean it is bugged too. When the wolf isn't showing before it is sated you don't get any attack speed from it until the wolf comes back. It is a really weird bug.
{{champion:238}}  then {{champion:92}}  ranked gogogogo!!
Hey yas, get bugged

> [{quoted}](name=Popstar Ahri,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:04:09.883+0000)
>
> jk
> 
> ITS TIME TO CELEBRATE AND SPAM RANKED !!

It seems like these 2 champions attract toxic players. I can't remember playing a lost ranked game without a Zed saying "Noob team," or a Riven blaming everyone for her failures.
This is sooo accurate. But don't think it's just ranked, that's what they're like in Normals too

At this point, I can say that I can't remember playing a lost ranked game with ANYONE that wasn't toxic. At least down here in shit-tiers Bronze and Silver, if you lose or are losing, everyone's just going to be pointing fingers at each other and spamming chat in all caps.

I've never smiled so much in this game.
THANK THE RITO GODS FOR THIS BLESSING!!!
How do people even find these bugs? O.o

Any idea why they disabled riven. 
my best guess would be that every time my champ would get close to her I would have some sort of movement impairment that cause me to stop moving for like .1 sec. 
but who knows it could of just been lag
bug makes it so she can instant recall

> [{quoted}](name=lergaze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:48:58.975+0000)
>
> any idea why they disabled riven

Probably the instant recall bug
[Here's a video showing it](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lNjuunnPDvY)
thanks

Meanwhile ahri still 54% winrate with a bigger playerbase.
First time ahris have a 53% winrate.
Yeah, lets complain about riven lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Broken Wings,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:27:36.526+0000)
>
> Meanwhile ahri still 54% winrate with a bigger playerbase.
> First time ahris have a 53% winrate.
> Yeah, lets complain about riven lol.

Salty Riven main is salty

Riven could have a 45% win rate, but she is still annoying as hell.

> [{quoted}](name=Xx420n0sc0p3sxX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:31:29.860+0000)
>
> Salty Riven main is salty
> 
> Riven could have a 45% win rate, but she is still annoying as hell.

How are the Riven mains the ones that are salty, when they aren't the ones making and posting in whiny QQ threads?

He brought up Ahri because the OP mains Ahri (presumably). Ahri is far stronger and harder to deal with than Riven, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=NemeBro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:36:47.278+0000)
>
> How are the Riven mains the ones that are salty, when they aren't the ones making and posting in whiny QQ threads?
> 
> He brought up Ahri because the OP mains Ahri (presumably). Ahri is far stronger and harder to deal with than Riven, lol.

OP was just making a joke. This is not a "QQ thread." The Riven main couldn't take a joke. Hence he was the salty one.

My only problem as a non-Riven player is that the boards go a little overboard about anything in regards to assassins and Riven. I mean, I understand it, I 100% do, but I wish people would calm down just a tad. That's all. 

I'd personally love if someone like Nautilus was disabled, because no matter who I play he's annoying as any assassin in the game to myself, but if he was actually disabled that isn't cause for celebration. C'mon guys, tone it down just a tad. Keep celebrating a bit though, because it is pretty funny.

> [{quoted}](name=NemeBro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hB7NEYj7,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-07-15T22:36:47.278+0000)
>
> How are the Riven mains the ones that are salty, when they aren't the ones making and posting in whiny QQ threads?
> 
> He brought up Ahri because the OP mains Ahri (presumably). Ahri is far stronger and harder to deal with than Riven, lol.

No, Mr Broken Wings just complains about Ahri, I've seen other post from him about her being op. Idc if she's op, I'm saying that Riven is super annoying.

EDIT: Imo, Riven is harder to deal with. Any good Riven will usually get a bit tanky, which means you can't burst her because they normally get around 3.5-4k effective health (Includes shield), and deal a good deal of damage. I'm not saying Ahri is easy to deal with, cause she isn't, just that Riven, for me, is harder to fight.

There are two problems with this.

The first is that Riven was un-disabled.

The second is that ranked was disabled.
It's finally sunny in league.

Spam ranked you say? Dw, riot has you covered :^)
No more ranked while Riven is disabled, that just wouldn't be fair.

Rank is disabled.

Serves you right
I'm going to count how many of these threads I see, this one is 5th
QUICK, make fake videos of random champion bugs to get them disabled!
The look on BoxBox's face would be_** priceless**_

I'm really not trying to be a dick or anything, but people in low ELO should love it when Riven gets played. I've played against low ELO Riven players in normal blinds and on smurfs, and they really don't know how to play that champion and misplay her super hard. I mean even in my ELO Riven players aren't even that good, except for the occasional main who plays it well.

Also people complaining about Zed still? He's one of the most balanced assassins in the game right now.
Why are ppl mad about Zed
Great first i was main zed,they banned him forever,i bought riven afterwards and played her a lot and now what DISABLED too< btw the bug is where pressing b+w the autoattack+q insta tp at base
that is actually pretty insane

Typical player: OMG this champ that I feel is OP is disabled OMG every op champ needs to be banned omg riot have you seen kalista and vayne and ezreal and what about rumble OMG there are so many just ban them all so I can win games but if I loss well its just because that champ is op
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d1jCBZIH5s8 guys look
